Famicom Title (JP): スーパーマリオブラザーズ
スーパーマリオブラザーズ3
Notes: Uses MMC3; JP catalog code HVC-UM.

Famicom Title (JP): ゼルダの伝説 (THE HYRULE FANTASY)
Notes: JP first on FDS; later Famicom cart HVC-ZL in 1994.

NES Title (US): Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
Notes: Action-RPG sequel; JP released on FDS in 1987.
JP adds FDS extra audio; NES conversion uses MMC1 with passwords.

Famicom Title (JP): 光神話 パルテナの鏡
Notes: JP FDS version features save; NES uses passwords.

Save (JP): Data Recorder (via Famicom Keyboard) for track data
Notes: JP supports external Data Recorder for saving track editor data.
